title: Median age of the population in Greece 2015
summary: Overall Median age in years has increased over the Year.
Median age in years is slightly increasing from 2005 to 2030, and finally roughly constant from 2030 to 2040.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2015.
The highest Median age in years, of value 52.7 was reached at Year 2040
The lowest Median age in years, of value 39.4 was reported at Year 2005
min_summary: In general Median age in years has rose over the Year.
Median age in years is slightly increasing from 2005 to 2030, and finally roughly constant from 2030 to 2040.
